        public Node getNodeAt(int position)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        public Node getNode(XBeeAddress64 addr64)

        Returns:

      • getNode

        public Node getNode(XBeeAddress16 addr16)
        Searches the NodeManager for a node with the specified 16-bit address and returns it. If there is no such node, function returns null.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • xbeeEventReceived

        public void xbeeEventReceived(XBeeEvent event)
        Handles all XBeeEvents received. If you register this class as a listener to a Lithne object, it will automatically attempt to maintain the correct information.
        Specified by:
        xbeeEventReceived in interface XBeeListener
